column5: Spent last week up at Beaverland Camp in Marten River with a great bunch of guys. All 14 of us were accommodated in cabin #14 which has 4 bedrooms with two sets of bunks in each.  It was my first time up with this bunch (some have been coming up together for decades) and I am proud to say I was voted back in for next year!  Fishing was decent, with the most / largest fish coming from Bruce Lake (access to McPhee was restricted due to a large beaver dam).  Lots of smaller walleye just under the slot (16.9 - 23.6") made for a couple of awesome fish frys.  Most of the smaller ones came on a whole nightcrawler while drifting.  The large ones on plastic (love those Powerbait Rippletails in white!!) Caught quite a few pike on soft swimbaits too, nothing too big but good for the fish fry. Bass opened up on the last fishing day so we got into a few of them too.  Here are some pics:         Spotted some young moose crossing Bruce Lake, man can they ever move:     One just at top end of the slot:   Just over the slot at 24 1/4" :   A respectable bass from Saturday:   Burt
Looks like a fun trip, you did well!    Just ram the beaver.
Well done.  Area looks mint and congrats on not getting voted off the island and being reinvited to outwit, outplay and outlast the others next season. lol.  Thanks for reporting.
I gotta get to Bruce some day. Looks like a great trip...so far everything I've heard about beaverland has been good. I love that general area! It's my favorite hang out spot in the whole world.
Nice trip, thanks for the report
looks like a real nice area, thanks for the report !
Good stuff.  Marten lake is awesome and still seems to have lots of big fish.
I am going to be up this way with my son for 5 days.  Leaving on Thursday.  I know the area very well.  Good fishing in the whole area.
